lines.text: Hey, man, drugs are a deadly trip, you know?

[attempts to claim his change from a pay phone at the airport]
Ahh, I hope you choke on it.
Nice chow and no bounty hunters, huh? That's the last time I'm having dinner with you.
What I meant, and what I implied, are two different things.
Let's see what he can afford.

[after handing Scott his blade]
You just made the endangered species list.
I'm looking for my friend Mac.
We're in a deep hole - we're gonna need a packed hand to get out of it.
How about... a royal flush!
[kicks a cauldron of boiling water into the bad guys]
You speak the language pree-TTy good... now what did you say to him?

[presses gun against Scott's chest]
Don't Move!

[raises hands]
Hey man, I'm a statue.

[Mac has just finished two shots of the snake blood]
You've been here too long
[shakes head]
This is Thailand kid... Not Indiana... You gotta be practical.

[to Thai gym owner]
My friend teach me
[raises fist]
Tae Kwon Do. Kickboxing not the same.

[to Mac after climbing up the waterslide]
These back roads are a bitch!

[after Scott accidentally hits a rock with his crossbow]
Jesus kid, you want a Chinese gong to beat on to?
Can somebody tell me what the hell's going on?
Ah, she's pissed because I wouldn't jump her bones.
He's threatened because I used to break his.
You come now, or die!
So what's our third choice?
You want? You want?
Sorry, but I'm going to have to take a rain check.
Check? Okay! Check! Check!
Who are they?
The first is Khmer Rouge, but what about the Thai? He's China's contact. He fights likes a tiger!
Tell me who sent you. I will see to it you get out alive.
Well, I'll tell you. I think the tour operator was... Cambodian Holidays.
Tour operator?
Like I was saying, I was separated from my tour. We were supposed to view the remains of a B-52 today.
I really should be getting back. They take a head count, and if you're not there at dinner, it's the stockade.

[offers the snake's blood]
Here. Try some of this. Put more lead in your pencil.
If that's the case, you need it more than I do.
Yeah, you're probably right.
